1.name: Out of the Past
1.description: A private eye escapes his past to run a gas station in a small town, but his past catches up with him. Now he must return to the big city world of danger, corruption, double crosses and duplicitous dames.

2.name: Smash-Up: The Story of a Woman
2.description: A successful nightclub singer weds a struggling songwriter, but when his fame eclipses hers, she delves into alcoholism.

3.name: Black Narcissus
3.description: After opening a convent in the Himalayas, five nuns encounter conflict and tension - both with the natives and also within their own group - as they attempt to adapt to their remote, exotic surroundings.

4.name: Nightmare Alley
4.description: The rise and fall of Stanton Carlisle, a mentalist whose lies and deceit prove to be his downfall.

5.name: The Ghost and Mrs. Muir
5.description: In 1900, a young widow finds her seaside cottage is haunted...and forms a unique relationship with the ghost.

6.name: Possessed
6.description: After being found wandering the streets of Los Angeles, a severely catatonic woman tells a doctor the complex story of how she wound up there.

7.name: The Lady from Shanghai
7.description: Fascinated by gorgeous Mrs. Bannister, seaman Michael O'Hara joins a bizarre yachting cruise, and ends up mired in a complex murder plot.

8.name: The Bishop's Wife
8.description: An angel in human form enters the life of a bishop in order to help him build a new cathedral and repair his fractured marriage.

9.name: Miracle on 34th Street
9.description: When a nice old man who claims to be Santa Claus is institutionalized as insane, a young lawyer decides to defend him by arguing in court that he is the real thing.

10.name: Monsieur Verdoux
10.description: A suave but cynical man supports his family by marrying and murdering rich women for their money, but the job has some occupational hazards.

11.name: Dark Passage
11.description: A man convicted of murdering his wife escapes from prison and works with a woman to try and prove his innocence.

12.name: Gentleman's Agreement
12.description: A reporter pretends to be Jewish in order to cover a story on anti-Semitism, and personally discovers the true depths of bigotry and hatred.

13.name: The Red House
13.description: An old man and his sister are concealing a terrible secret from their adopted teen daughter, concerning a hidden abandoned farmhouse, located deep in the woods.

14.name: The Paradine Case
14.description: A happily married London barrister falls in love with the accused poisoner he is defending.

15.name: Odd Man Out
15.description: A wounded Irish nationalist leader attempts to evade police following a failed robbery in Belfast.

16.name: Kiss of Death
16.description: Nick Bianco is caught during a botched jewellery heist. The prosecution offer him a more lenient sentence if he squeals on his accomplices but he doesn't roll over on them. Three years into the sentence an event changes his mind.

17.name: Life with Father
17.description: A financier from New York rules his numerous family, consisting of his wife and his four sons, with the meticulousness of a bookkeeper.

18.name: Angel and the Badman
18.description: Quirt Evans, an all round bad guy, is nursed back to health and sought after by Penelope Worth, a Quaker girl. He eventually finds himself having to choose between his world and the world Penelope lives in.

19.name: Crossfire
19.description: A man is murdered, apparently by one of a group of demobilized soldiers he met in a bar. But which one? And why?

20.name: Dead Reckoning
20.description: A soldier runs away rather than receive the Medal of Honor, so his buddy gets permission to investigate, and love and death soon follow.

21.name: The Bachelor and the Bobby-Soxer
21.description: A high school girl falls for a playboy artist, with screwball results.

22.name: Unconquered
22.description: Intrepid frontiersman Chris Holden foils the political and personal ambitions of renegade Martin Garth in the Ohio Valley following the French and Indian War.

23.name: T-Men
23.description: Two US Treasury agents hunt a successful counterfeiting ring.

24.name: Nora Prentiss
24.description: Quiet, organised Dr Talbot meets nightclub singer Nora Prentiss when she is slightly hurt in a street accident. Despite her misgivings they become heavily involved and Talbot finds he is ...                See full summary »

25.name: A Double Life
25.description: Anthony John is an actor whose life is strongly influenced by the characters he plays. When he's playing comedy, he's the most enjoyable person in the world, but when he's playing drama, ...                See full summary »

26.name: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty
26.description: A clumsy daydreamer gets caught up in a sinister conspiracy.

27.name: Born to Kill
27.description: A calculating divorcée risks her chances at wealth and security with a man she doesn't love by getting involved with the hotheaded murderer romancing her foster sister.

28.name: Forever Amber
28.description: In seventeenth-century England, Amber St. Clair aims to raise herself from country girl to nobility, and succeeds, but loses her true love in the process.

29.name: Fun & Fancy Free
29.description: Jiminy Cricket hosts two Disney animated shorts: "Bongo," about a circus bear escaping to the wild, and "Mickey and the Beanstalk," a take on the famous fairy tale.

30.name: Brute Force
30.description: At a tough penitentiary, prisoner Joe Collins plans to rebel against Captain Munsey, the power-mad chief guard.

31.name: The Egg and I
31.description: On their wedding night, Bob reveals to Betty that he has purchased an abandoned chicken farm. Betty struggles to adapt to their new rural lifestyle, especially when a glamorous neighbor seems to set her eyes on Bob.

32.name: Lured
32.description: A serial killer in London is murdering young women he meets through the personal columns of newspapers. He announces each of his murders to the police by sending them a cryptic poem. After ...                See full summary »

33.name: Boomerang!
33.description: The true story of a prosecutor's fight to prove the innocence of a man accused of a notorious murder.

34.name: My Favorite Brunette
34.description: Shortly before his execution on the death row in San Quentin, amateur sleuth and baby photographer Ronnie Jackson, tells reporters how he got there.

35.name: Secret Beyond the Door...
35.description: When a lovely woman and her new husband settle in an ancient mansion on the East coast, she discovers that he may want to kill her.

36.name: They Won't Believe Me
36.description: On trial for murdering his girlfriend, philandering stockbroker Larry Ballentine takes the stand to claim his innocence and describe the actual, but improbable sounding, sequence of events that led to her death.

37.name: The Fabulous Dorseys
37.description: The rise and rise of the Fabulous Dorsey brothers is charted in this whimsical step down memory lane, Tommy and Jimmy Dorsey play themselves in this vehicle for their excellent music. From ...                See full summary »

38.name: Honeymoon
38.description: A prospective bride and groom have misadventures in Mexico City.

39.name: Green Dolphin Street
39.description: Sophie loved Edmund, but he left town when her parents forced her to marry wealthy Octavius. Years later, Edmund returns with his son, William. Sophie's daughter, Marguerite, and William ...                See full summary »

40.name: Body and Soul
40.description: A talented boxer's young career hits difficult terrain when an unethical promoter takes interest in him.

41.name: I Walk Alone
41.description: Frankie Madison leaves prison expecting a share from his ex-partner. But Prohibition bootlegging didn't prepare Frankie for Big Business.

42.name: The Farmer's Daughter
42.description: After leaving her family's farm to study nursing in the city, a young woman finds herself on an unexpected path towards politics.

43.name: Ride the Pink Horse
43.description: WW2 veteran Lucky Gagin arrives in a New Mexico border-town intent on revenging against mobster Frank Hugo but FBI agent Bill Retz, who also wants Hugo, tries to keep Gagin out of trouble.

44.name: Dishonored Lady
44.description: Madeleine Damien is the fashion editor of a slick Manhattan magazine by day and a lively party girl by night. Unfortunately, the pressures of her job, including kowtowing to a hefty ...                See full summary »

45.name: The Two Mrs. Carrolls
45.description: An artist forms an attachment with a woman on holiday in the country. As the relationship develops, his behavior and information about his past cause her increasing concern.

46.name: The Sea of Grass
46.description: On America's frontier, a St. Louis woman marries a New Mexico cattleman who is seen as a tyrant by the locals.

47.name: Johnny O'Clock
47.description: High-class crook gets in trouble with the law.

48.name: Song of the Thin Man
48.description: Nick and Nora investigate the murder of a bandleader in New York.

49.name: Quai des Orfèvres
49.description: Jenny Lamour wants to succeed in music hall. Her husband and accompanist is Maurice Martineau, a nice but jealous man. When he knew Jenny is making eyes at Brignon, an old businessman, in ...                See full summary »

50.name: Framed
50.description: Mike Lambert, seeking a mining job, instead becomes the patsy for a femme-fatale's schemes.
